metadata.name: E-MATE #1
metadata.description: E-MATES is a customizable avatar NFT optimized for social media profiles. You can pay for Klaytn Chainâ€™s token mix and modify properties such as background, clothing, and pets. For this reason, the rarity of each NFT displayed on Opensea or any other marketplace may change. The property, STATUS is displayed as Intial if the property is in the original published state, and as Customized if changed. Customizing like the initial E-MATE is prohibited. It will be protected that all initial E-MATEs are unique. Even if you change the properties of your E-MATE, you can also pay for the mix and reset it to its initial state.
